summary: This document is a summary of monthly charges for an AT&T Wireless account, detailing the billing cycle, charges, and usage for the period from January 12, 2005, to February 11, 2005. It includes information on service charges, payment options, and account adjustments. This document contains detailed records of voice usage for phone calls made and received, including timestamps, call durations, and locations. It highlights the frequency and nature of communications, primarily in Florida, related to the Epstein case. This document contains detailed records of voice and data usage for an AT&T Wireless account, including incoming and outgoing calls, text messages, and associated charges. The records span several days in early February 2005 and provide insights into communication patterns.
keyFacts: The document outlines a total amount due of $54.19 for the billing cycle.
